snippet.title: "Bendy and the Ink Machine" - Console Trailer
snippet.description:
*UPREATE* Get Bendy and the Ink Machine on XBox One, Playstation 4 and Nintendo Switch November 20th.

Get Bendy and the Ink Machine Chapters 1-4 now on Steam and receive Chapter 5 for free unlocking the Complete Edition on October 26th: https://store.steampowered.com/bundle/4554/BATIM/

http://www.joeydrewstudios.com

© 2017-2018 Joey Drew Studios Inc. 
Bendy, Bendy and the Ink Machine, Bendy in Nightmare Run, The Bendy characters, images and logos are trademarks of Joey Drew Studios Inc. All Rights Reserved.
